CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Adial Pharmaceuticals Inc is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company. The company develops prescription medications for addiction and related disorders. Its lead product is AD04, which is for the treatment of alcohol use disorder.
